output.sentences: Jane and Bob Davis and their friend, Dan,  decided to take a trip to their favorite baseball park.
They checked into a hotel to make it a two day stay.
Jane had always been a baseball fan.
While in the city, they took advantage of the many parks and opportunities to walk.
At the end of the day they all gathered for cocktails and dinner at a famous restaurant.
